name: OHB
goal: OHB offers solutions addressing the entire value chain for satellite development, construction and operation, data transmission and processing and the development and construction of scientific payloads and aerospace/aviation structures.
interests: Business and Industry, Business and Industry, Climate Action, External Relations, Research and innovation, Transport
euInitiatives:
- European Space Policy in general
- European GNSS (Galileo)
- Copernicus
- Horizon 2020
- EU Space Strategy
